metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0555 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability in libavc in Mediaserver could enable a local malicious application to access data outside of its permission levels. This issue is rated as Moderate because it could be used to access data without permission. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID: A-33551775.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> See CVE-2015-1538 for information on ubuntu use of android tools

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
